snippet.title: Back Then - Story Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Thomas Eilian is an elderly poet and writer diagnosed with Alzheimer’s. Bound to only move around in a wheelchair, he finds himself alone for what seems like years roaming an empty house. “The clock is ticking, the hours are going by. The past increases, the future recedes. Possibilities decreasing, regrets mounting.”

Game Socials:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BackThenGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/gaming/BackThenGame/
IndieDB: https://www.indiedb.com/games/back-then
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/outriderstudio/

Join our discord channel!

We at Outriders appreciate you taking the time and watching our newest teaser. We're hard at work to provide you with an unique experience and this is just a little sample of what's ahead.
